article: sixteen-year-old markswoman lee ho lim from south korea won her first world cup gold medal at her third attendance in the meet at the shooting world cup in milan on wednesday and took a quota place for her nation for beijing olympics #### .
abstract: sixteen-year-old korean won gold at shooting world cup
